title: BRIEF-Ayo Says Not Applied To S. Africa Reserve Bank To Transfer Funds Off-Shore
text:
BRIEF-Ayo Says Not Applied To S. Africa Reserve Bank To Transfer Funds Off-Shore

Stock Markets 13 minutes ago (Oct 16, 2019 07:42)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Ayo Says Not Applied To S. Africa Reserve Bank To Transfer Funds Off-Shore Oct 16 (Reuters) - Ayo Technology Solutions Ltd : * SHAREHOLDERS REFERRED TO COMMENTS BY PIC THAT IT IS CONSIDERING COURT ACTION TO PREVENT CO FROM "ALLEGEDLY TRANSFERRING FUNDS OFF-SHORE" * SAYS PIC'S ALLEGATIONS "ARE WITHOUT MERIT" * HAS NOT MADE APPLICATION TO SOUTH AFRICAN RESERVE BANK TO TRANSFER FUNDS OFF-SHORE NOR DOES IT INTEND TO DO SO * SENT LETTER TO PIC WHICH INCLUDED DETAILS OF VARIOUS ACCOUNTS, ACCOUNT NUMBERS IN WHICH CO'S FUNDS ARE HELD AT SOUTH AFRICAN BANKERS

BRIEF-Ayo Says Not Applied To S. Africa Reserve Bank To Transfer Funds Off-Shore
description: BRIEF-Ayo Says Not Applied To S. Africa Reserve Bank To Transfer Funds Off-Shore
